modal.techTitle: Why this is safe? / How it works
modal.techDesc1: Your creative data is secured using cryptographic hashing (SHA-256). These unique fingerprints are aggregated into a Merkle Tree structure.
modal.techDesc2: Finally, we batch these proofs into a single verifiable transaction on the blockchain. This ensures your work is mathematically proven to exist at this specific time, with the security of the entire network.
